errors.error_description: Added incorrect system package installation command that uses wrong package names
correction_candidates: Change to `sudo apt-get install python3-dev libffi-dev libssl-dev libyaml-dev` with correct package names
Replace with `pip install --upgrade setuptools wheel` for Python dependency management
Use `sudo yum install python3-devel openssl-devel libffi-devel` for Red Hat based systems
Remove the system dependency installation command as it's not needed for this integration
errors.golden_answer: Remove the system dependency installation command as it's not needed for this integration
